replies.bodyText:
Not all of them were, quite a few were in other locations.
In any case, order doesn't matter. Mixins just get added in-place.
I've gone through and move all @include buttonShadowBorder; to the top of their blocks.
replies.author: SammyIsConfused

timeline.message:
Add workaround for centring the resource selector window

Previously I attempted to do this by setting display:grid on
fancybox-inner and justifying to the centre. Unfortunately,
fancybox-inner is used in other areas of oEQ (namely the popup
taxonomy selector) and breaks things. Doing it this way is not
ideal but it prevents the control from breaking.
Move all @include buttonShadowBorder to top of blocks

Simplify selection summary CSS selector
